mdRecord.dcterms:title: French helicopter flying over Mount Vernon, May 1, 1957
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Republic Aviation Corporation
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of a French helicopter flying over the east front of the Mansion. A type written note on the reverse reads: Pilots of two French jet helicopters, retracing by air some of Lafayette's travels under auspices of Carl Byoir & Associates, public relations counsel for Republic Aviation Corporation.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
